Question: In the 1970s, this person performed his offbeat, absurdist comedy routines before packed houses on national tours.
Hints: This person began working local clubs at night, to mixed notices, and at twenty-one he dropped out of college.
At age 67, this person became a first-time dad when Stringfield gave birth to a baby girl in December 2012.
On the show, this person popularized the air quotes gesture, which uses four fingers to make double quote marks in the air.
